I'm assuming it's because there's not that many people making them, but that doesn't explain the extreme price point, for, literally, a piece of plastic... especially being a product that specific to parents. Parents already spend so much money, and now people want to gouge them for more over... nothing special. That being said, if this was cheaper I'd buy tons of them, for family and friends.

Also, my older son's Graco has a very thick buckle which it seemed this would not fit over at first, but again... A bit of wiggling it around and it did work though it was a tight fit. I have the hardest time unlatching the car seat. I am not even concerned about breaking a nail, although this would help. It is just awkward to push the button and the straps are tight enough on the baby, not I am trying to slide hand behind the strap to get a better angle on the buckle...not anymore. The car seat key simply slides around the buckle, squeeze it, and Poof! Your little one is ready to get out of their chair. It is a bit bulky to add to my keys, but it has to be this way in order to fit around the buckle. I would recommend this to my friends. UPDATE: Two years later and my Car Seat Key has snapped in half, but I would definitely buy it again. My mother has had her's for two years and it is still as good as the day she bought it. We've all been to baby showers; we've all seen the mountains of clothes, blankets, bottles, and pacifiers when all is said and done. What you'll rarely see is gifts that are practical and which are going to be helpful to the new parents for the long haul! The Carseat Key is a baby shower game-changer. Not only is it something that the parents will be able to use for years to come; it's also something that no one else will think to purchase! It's exactly the kind of gift that parents won't even know they were missing until they've received it. Who DOESN'T want a tool that's going to make the absolute chore of getting babies and toddlers out of the car a little bit easier?! I'm so excited to have a foolproof baby shower gift for all of my friends who are parents-to-be. That said, I couldn't have been more pleased with the speed of the delivery, the packaging, and the quality of the product itself. This little gadget is such a great conversation starter and I can't imagine how anyone wouldn't be grateful to receive one. An amazing invention by an amazing human being. Kristin, you rule!

I was skeptical, but having longer nails this past year is one of the few things that kept me feeling like the world was normal. Anyway, I can't believe I struggled for months before searching for something like this. It changed my life - seriously - some days I didn't know if I was going to get the kids out of their seats at all (tears were involved on numerous occasions).
